name: Blu Impact
tagline: We are consultants & we develop digital strategies
description:
Blu Impact is a performance marketing agency located in downtown San Francisco.
We specialize in custom strategic digital marketing solutions. We work with executives to plan, design, build and manage successful digital strategies that are essential to business growth and sustainability.
Blu Impact provides the necessary components for establishing thought leaders and industry authorities.
We help clients generate more leads to increase ROI, this translates to selling more products and services, capitalizing on new opportunities, gaining competitive advantages and transforming businesses.
